The goal is to help Clover inside of a gate by rapidly clicking on the door. As the gate opens, the clicking action switches from opening the gate to seemingly groping/slapping Clover's breasts.

Three gates are presented, though Clover's outfit changes depending on which gate the player is presented to open. The first gate's outfit is her typical getup in Virtue's Last Reward, the second is a sukumizu (スク水), and the third is a black bikini. The third gate is notably difficult and its reward is cut short by Clover covering up her nearly-revealed breasts while K's portrait is laid over her face.

name: Variable Chaser Valchase
description:
Conglomerates struggle against each other to gain the right to develop the outer space.

Valchase, the latest model of chaser, flies a mission to get back the stolen classified information.

name: Galaxy Dungeon
description: Sin descripción

name: Mega Run: Redford's Adventure
description: A sidescroller jump'n'run game.

name: Psycho Logy
description: Sin descripción

name: Gamedog
description: Enjoy twelve of the craziest games ever seen on Steam in this retro-inspired collection with full Xbox 360 controller support. Meet your soul mate in GIRL CUBE. Blast your way through the universe in AERODRUHIT. Zap players on the rink in HOCKEY LORDS. Avoid temptation and collect the coins in DEVIL'S ROAD. And much more - there's TWELVE unique, all-new games in this insane, value-packed wonder fest. You WILL be barking at the moon in pleasure after gaming on your own personal GAMEDOG machine all night long. And best of all? Many of the games have high-score leaderboards! With 20 mind-bending Steam achievements, you're sure to have a playtime measured in WEEKS - ARROOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

name: Pac-Man Arcade Emulator
description: Despite the name, it's not an emulated version of the arcade game. Rather, it's a homebrew conversion of Pac-Man for the Amstrad CPC, in a way that tries to be the as arcade-perfect as it could with the CPC's hardware limits.

name: Hello Kitty's Pie Shop
description: This game puts the adorable Hello Kitty in her kitchen as she gets ready to bake a pie, and you'll be helping her out to create the most delicious pies in the world!

name: My Melody & Kuromi no Machigai Sagashi
description: My Melody & Kuromi no Machigai Sagashi is a browser based game that was hosted on the Yahoo Japan website during a collaboration between Sanrio and Yahoo in 2012.

name: Neon Race 2
description: Race at super speeds through futuristic landscapes. More speed, more upgrades, more unlocks, more TURBO!

name: Icy Fishes
description: A fun chain reaction game with strategic system. Help the octopus to rescue fishes from ice floes to… eat them

name: Jelly Escape
description: Jelly Escape is an action-packed pixelated platformer with a classic retro look! Help your fellow jellies escape and maneuver your way through intricate levels to make it to the exit. Overcome treacherous obstacles, solve puzzles, beware of enemy blobs, and collect energy along the way to rescue all the jellies. How quickly can you Escape?

name: Battle Gear 3
description: The long awaited sequel to Battle Gear 2 is here! Get ready for the fight of your life! Battle Gear 3 takes the familiar formula from Battle Gear 2 and improves upon it by adding more units, more strategy, and a greater diversity of upgrades! The whole point of the game is to conquer the world one country at a time by carefully managing your troops! There are tons of upgrades and leveling up to do! How far can you get in this exciting strategy game? Good luck!

name: Notebook Wars 3
description:
Get ready for the ultimate notebook shooter!
Destroy hundreds of enemies and bosses to earn enought money to buy better planes and weapons, you have 40 different planes and 20 upgradable weapons to buy, and a survival mode… have fun!

name: Dragon's Lair
description:
A homebrew port of the Coleco Adam Dragon's Lair game to the Colecovision

All the action of the arcade game in your living room! This special adaptation brings home all the excitement of the legendary arcade game and gives you even more control over the action! Lead Dirk the Daring on his quest to rescue beautiful Princess Daphne, who's been imprisoned in a crystal ball by the evil dragon. To complete this noble mission, you'll need courage and quick reflexes! Fend off supernatural forces with your sword or use your wits to escape. Swing on a rope over fiery chasms. Fight fierce battles with the dreaded Phantom Knight and cunning rat guards. Find a way to survive and you'll take on the most deadly foe of all, the diabolical dragon himself!

name: A.E.
description: A.E. is a Space Invaders inspired game with a 3D view. In A.E. the earth is under attack by swarms of aliens who drop bomb after bomb and it's your job to defend planet Earth. You control a laser cannon that moves horizontally at the bottom of the screen. To earn point you should shoot all the alien forces before they shoot you! The game becomes more challenging when you progress in the game as the alien swarm splits up and attack you from several sides. This version is a homebrew version released in 2012

name: Ice Age: Continental Drift
description: Scrat's nutty pursuit of the accursed acorn, which he's been after since the dawn of time, has world-changing consequences - a continental cataclysm that triggers the greatest adventure of all. Join Scrat, Manny, Diego and Sid on a wild journey through 13 levels spread across 5 icy environments.

name: Phonopath
description:
Phonopath is a puzzle game based entirely in audio.

Each stage of the game is comprised of a sound clip and password request. The password lies hidden within the audio file itself, and can only be revealed through critical listening, careful analysis and manipulation.

Phonopath aims to explore the limits of “the audio file as a puzzle medium”. Expect to learn something.

name: Harmony's Nightmare
description: Harmony's Nightmare is a multi-genre homebrew Wii game about a young girl's nightmares. The game is divided into 4 levels, each with a different play style. To beat the game you must collect at least 100 notes.

name: Compact Cyber Arcade: Ultimate Spider-Man
description: A Handheld game system based on the TV series Ultimate Spider-Man.

name: Plants vs. Zombies
description: A J2ME port of Plants vs. Zombies which includes less features to make the game size small enough for Java-based phones.

name: Gabrielle's Monster Match
description: Sin descripción

name: Rose Guns Days: Season 2
description: Rose Guns Days: Season 2 is the second installment in the Rose Guns Days series, which consists of five chapters and covers the years 1947 and 1948.

name: Little Big City
description: Be the Mayor! Design and build the prospering city of your dreams! Make it a wonderful place to live for your citizens using a vast number of creative resources. Unleash your imagination as you place functional buildings and cool decorations. Meet characters who can't wait to be your neighbors and help each other's cities grow. You can even take an entertaining break from being Mayor with special mini-games that will challenge you and offer various missions and collectibles.

name: Snezhnaya Koroleva
description: Snow Queen is a bootleg NES game based on the 2012 movie Snow Queen.

name: Snezhnaya Koroleva
description: Snow Queen is an unlicensed game based on the 2012 Russian movie based on the same game. The game is a rom hack of Mick And Mack as the Global Gladiators with entirely new levels.

name: Let's Sing 5: Version Espanola
description: Sin descripción

name: Call of Cthulhu
description: Sin descripción

name: Maratón
description:
Mexico's most beloved trivia game!

Have fun and learn, either alone or with friends, answering questions of general interest.

name: 1Dreamboy
description: 1Dreamboy is an unofficial dating simulator based on One Direction. It is the first part of the 1Dreamboy series.

name: Altf4
description: Minimalist abstract environments join with exploration gaming. The locations are varied and incongruous, often consisting of line art and nearly monochrome pallets. Be warned, visual style takes precedence over functionality making navigation tricky at times.

name: NS-Shaft
description: NS-Shaft is an unlicensed port of the game of the same name included in the Terminator 1.8 handheld system.

name: Risker
description: Risker is an unlicensed clone of Mario Bros. that is bundled in the Terminator 1.8 handheld system.

name: Plants vs. Zombies

name: Team Hot Wheels: Moto X
description: Team Hot Wheels: Moto X is an arcade racing game. The objective of the game is to score points in the race to unlock official Team Hot Wheels vehicles and car paint schemes. The points are earned for collecting pick-ups, smashing everything in the way, and winning the race. While racing a speed booster can be used. The player race against ghosts of the best times. The game features only one track, two camera views and allows to change the color of the driver and car parts. After scoring 100,000 points the player becomes a member of the Hot Wheels Team.

name: Ben 10
description: Ben 10 is an unlicensed Russian Sega Mega Drive port of a beat-em-up for Java phones Ben 10: The Power Of Omnitrix, based on the TV series of the same name. No developer credits exist in the game, but several elements point it to having been made by BMB.

name: Angry Birds
description: Angry Birds, also known as Angry Bird 3, is a pirated game for the Famicom based off of the mobile game. While the developer is unknown, it was most likely made by Nice Code.

name: Territory War 3
description: Online sequel to the popular flash arena frag games, Territory War. Features new maps, new weapons, gameplay modes and new ways to earn XP, and level up. Including a new level editor, for you to create the arena of your dreams - and your friend's nightmares.
